content.question: Of the feasible and efficient points on the production possibilities curve <math alttext="Open parenthesis, P P C, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> above, producing at which point will lead to the most economic growth in the future?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
